data.message: I hope the sound has been sorted for tonight. So disappointed with the show last night due to not being able to hear most of the set & when we could hear there was a delay. Eminem was amazing but the sound let it down. Absolutely gutted as been looking forward to this since it was announced.

replies.message: I went last night too I heard every bump if the bass but no lyric.  Gutted too!
Me too, I'm glad it's not just me, had been looking forward to the show since forever
Were you all at the back?
Sound was absolutely diabolical you could near hear what he was singing for the money paid it's disguisting!!!!

I agree I've wanted to see him forever and sound I couldn't make out lyrics really gutted too! I still love him and he is amazing but when you have dreamed all your life about that day and then can't hear him it's upsetting, sorry that you guys had same experience x
I could hear everything perfect lmao :s

I completely agree about the sound. It was my 40th birthday present and meant so much to me but was disappointed about the sound quality. Reading last year was so good. Shame! As my birthday is not until Friday Eminem you can make it up to me and deliver me a present? Flowers or champagne always works x
there was a few times i couldnt hear wht he was singing but soon caught up,but by far the best night of my life,id pay all over again bad sound or not.
